document_data.name: Yrlamar
document_data.mainbody: '''Yrlamar''' was a [[wizard]] who, in his old age, found himself imprisoned in the dungeons underneath the [[Fortress of the Five Vultures]] in [[Calaunt]]. Deprived of his [[spellbook]], he was unable to escape. Yrlamar was chained next to the wizard [[Thogaf]], and spent a lot of time training his much younger colleague in the art of [[magic]].
